member.name: M:M0JIV.MaidenheadLocator.MaidenheadLocatorEngine.GetLocator(System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the Maidenhead locator corresponding to a WGS84 Latitude/Longitude
member.param: Number of character pairs (e.g. AB12CD34 consists 4 pairs)

member.name: M:M0JIV.MaidenheadLocator.MaidenheadLocatorEngine.GetLatLon(System.String)
member.summary: Returns coordinates of centroid of squaroid indicated by the supplied locator

member.name: M:M0JIV.MaidenheadLocator.MaidenheadLocatorEngine.GetLatLonBounds(System.String)
member.summary: Returns 3 coordinates corresponding to the bottom left, centroid and top right of the squaroid

member.name: M:M0JIV.MaidenheadLocator.MaidenheadLocatorEngine.GetAllSquaroidsInRange(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get all squaroids which include the specified area
member.param: Number of character pairs in each squaroid
